title: 33. The procurement department at your company is migration all their applications to Google Cloud, and one of their engineers have asked you to provide them IAM access to create and manage service accounts in all Cloud Projects. What should you do?
alternatives: A. Grant the user roles/iam.serviceAccountAdmin IAM role.
B. Grant the user roles/iam.serviceAccountUser IAM role.
C. Grant the user roles/iam.securityAdmin IAM role.
D. Grant the user roles/iam.roleAdmin IAM role.
